rubric: Mouth - Ulcers inside cheek or lips
modality: Worse from salty food, touch, night
notes: Painful aphthous or syphilitic ulcers. Mercurius for offensive smell and salivation; Borax for tender ulcers that bleed easily.
Strange contradiction: mouth dry but no desire to drink. Nux moschata is highly specific.

modality: Worse in morning, with coated tongue
notes: Foul breath from dental decay, infections, or digestive issues. Merc and Kreosote are key remedies.
Excessive drooling especially in mouth ulcers, teething or during sleep. Mercurius is the strongest remedy here.

rubric: Mouth - Burning sensation in tongue or palate
modality: Worse from spicy food, hot drinks
notes: Burning mouth syndrome, menopausal or nutritional causes. Arsenicum and Sulphur are highly indicated.
Metallic taste common in toxic states or ulcerative mouth issues. Mercurius and Phosphorus are top choices.

modality: In chronic diseases, lead poisoning, debility
notes: Bluish gums seen in metal toxicity (e.g., lead), chronic ulcerative conditions. Plumbum is the leading remedy.
Swollen, inflamed gums with or without pain. Mercurius and Belladonna are highly effective.

rubric: Mouth - Ulcers inside cheek or lips
modality: Worse from salty food, touch, night
notes: Painful aphthous or syphilitic ulcers. Mercurius for offensive smell and salivation; Borax for tender ulcers that bleed easily.

rubric: Mouth - Ulcers on tongue or gums
notes: Painful ulcers with red borders or deep cracks. Nitric acid often for sharp, splinter-like pains.

modality: Worse from sour food, milk, at night
notes: White patches or ulcers, painful while feeding. Borax is mild and effective in infants.
Rapid caries especially in children. Kreosotum is a key remedy when teeth decay soon after eruption.

modality: Worse at night, from cold air, touch
notes: Severe dental pain especially during teething. Chamomilla when child is very irritable and sleepless.

modality: During sleep, with worms or anxiety
notes: Common in worm infestations, stress, or neurotic children. Cina and Tuberculinum highly effective.

rubric: Teeth - Looseness of teeth without pain
modality: With receding gums, old age or bone disease
notes: Teeth feel loose or fall out without inflammation. Phosphorus and Mercurius help prevent early loss.

rubric: Mouth - Obstruction of salivary ducts / stone formation
notes: Blocked salivary glands (e.g., submandibular swelling, sialolithiasis). Calcarea fluor and Silicea help resolve obstruction.

modality: Worse in winter, from heat, talking
notes: Chapped lips with crusts, fissures, bleeding. Natrum mur and Petroleum are highly specific for chronic dryness.
